content: SD 2500 Drywall screwdriver Corded drywall screwdriver with 2500 rpm for wood/drywall applications ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Drill drivers and screwdrivers- - - ### FEATURES:Features High performance due to strong 710W motor Balanced, comfortable ergonomics – for less downtime due to user fatigue Suitable for a wide range of interior finishing applications Directional venting helps to prevent dust from blowing into the operator’s face Quiet depth gauge coupling Applications Fastening drywall boards to metal or wood framing on walls and ceilings Fastening wood boards to metal or wood framing on walls and ceilings Screw fastening applications that require high torque (e.g. wood to wood) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Max. torque: 14 ft-lbs Rated voltage: 120 V Weight: 3.3 lb. Technical Data | Max. torque | 14 ft-lbs | Weight | 3.3 lb | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 12.2 x 3 x 6.7 in ### ITEMS- 285703 - Heavy duty drywall screwdriver SD 2500 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x SD 2500 120V Wood/drywall screwdriver - 1x Magnetic bit holder long standard (3) - 1x S-B PH2 25/1 IF Driver bit
